      Method to display the waiting scene

    • displayMessage

      void displayMessage(String message)
      Method to display a message
      Parameters:
      message - the message to display

    • askUserInfo

      void askUserInfo(boolean isRejoin)
      Method to request the user info
      Parameters:
      isRejoin - if it's true, the player can rejoin after disconnecting

    • askAssistant

      void askAssistant(Set<Integer> availableAssistantIds)
      Method to handle the choice of the assistant card
      Parameters:
      availableAssistantIds - available indexes of the assistant cards

    • askMoveStudentFromEntrance

      void askMoveStudentFromEntrance(Map<PawnColour,Boolean> hallColourAvailability)
      Method to handle the choice of the student to move from the entrance
      Parameters:
      hallColourAvailability - map of the colour of the students and their amount

    • moveMotherNature

      void moveMotherNature(Set<Integer> availableIsleIndexes)
      Method to handle the selection of the island where to put mother nature on
      Parameters:
      availableIsleIndexes - available indexes the player can choose from

    • askCloud

      void askCloud(Set<Integer> availableCloudIndexes)
      Method to handle the selection of the cloud
      Parameters:
      availableCloudIndexes - available indexes the player can choose from

      boardData - the board data

    • endGame

      void endGame(String causingPlayer, String cause)

    • askChooseIsland

      void askChooseIsland(boolean setBan, boolean calculateInfluence)
      Method to handle the client's island choice. If setBan is true, it put the ban on. If calculateInfluence is true, it calculates the influence
      Parameters:
      setBan - the island ban
      calculateInfluence - the island influence

    • askChooseColour

      void askChooseColour(int toDiscard, boolean toExclude)
      Method to handle the colour choice. If discard > 0 it discard the colour choice. If toExclude is true it exclude the colour choice when calculating influence
      Parameters:
      toDiscard - value of the colour to discard
      toExclude - if it's true it discard the colour

    • askMoveStudentsFromCard

      void askMoveStudentsFromCard(int characterId, MovementDestination destination, int studentsToMove, boolean canMoveLess)
      Method to handle the choice of the student on the Character Card
      Parameters:
      characterId - character's cards id
      destination - destination where to move the student to
      studentsToMove - value of the colour of the student to move
      canMoveLess - if it's true the player can decide to move less students, instead than all of them

    • askExchangeStudents

      void askExchangeStudents(int characterId, int numberOfStudents, MovementDestination from, MovementDestination to)
      Method to handle the exchange of students
      Parameters:
      characterId - character's cards id
      numberOfStudents - max number that the player can exchange
      from - starting location of the students to exchange
      to - destination of the students

    • initBoard

      void initBoard(BoardData boardData, boolean expertMode)
      Method to initialize the board
      Parameters:
      boardData - board data
      expertMode - if it's true the game mode is expert

    • askLoginInfo

      void askLoginInfo(String username, boolean canJoinLobby, boolean canRejoinLobby)
      Method to handle the request for lobby info
      Parameters:
      username - the player's chosen username
      canJoinLobby - if it's true, the player can join a lobby
      canRejoinLobby - if it's true, the player can rejoin a lobby after disconnecting

    • notifyDisconnection

      void notifyDisconnection(String disconnectedPlayerName)
      Method to notify the disconnection of a player
      Parameters:
      disconnectedPlayerName - username of the disconnected player

    • notifyPlayerHasJoined

      void notifyPlayerHasJoined(String joiningPlayer)
      Method to notify that a player has joined
      Parameters:
      joiningPlayer - username of the player that has joined the lobby

    • askLobbyInfo

      void askLobbyInfo()
